imdb.plot outline: Who will take home the top prizes at the "2016 SBS Drama Awards"? The "SBS Drama Awards" is an annual awards ceremony that celebrates the top dramas of the year, as well as the top actors and actresses, by the Seoul Broadcasting System (SBS), one of the major broadcasting networks in South Korea. Awarded since 1993, the awards program used to be called the "SBS Awards Festival" and is held each year on December 31.
imdb.title: 2016 SBS Drama Awards
plot: Who will take home the top prizes at the "_2016 SBS Drama Awards_ (qv)"? The "SBS Drama _Awards_ (qv)" is an annual awards ceremony that celebrates the top dramas of the year, as well as the top actors and actresses, by the Seoul Broadcasting System (SBS), one of the major broadcasting networks in South Korea. Awarded since 1993, the awards program used to be called the "SBS _Awards_ (qv) Festival" and is held each year on December 31.
